item.title: Trump set to meet Zelensky in Davos as his envoys head to Moscow
item.description: Trump and his envoy Witkoff have said a deal to resolve nearly four years of war between Russia and Ukraine is close.

item.title: What ICE is doing that’s so controversial
item.description: Americans are turning against ICE, polls show, yet its reach is expected only to grow.

item.title: In populist split, Trump’s fans in Europe broke with him on Greenland
item.description: The European far right’s pushback showed the limits of the president’s with-me-or-against-me politics, a key obstacle to cooperation among nationalist...

item.title: White House fences off park as Trump begins new building project
item.description: Officials said Lafayette Square, the public park next to the White House, will be improved as part of Trump’s America 250 celebration.

item.title: Jasmine Crockett is daring Democrats to rethink electability. Some aren’t sold.
item.description: “I get that I’m not a traditional candidate. And that’s exactly why I’m going to win,” the Texas Democrat said. Not everyone in her party sees it that...
